title: Is this off season April fools joke?

embed.description: This post is EXTREMELY !] [STATUS: PBE is currently .] The PBE has been updated! As we start the 8.24 PBE cycle, today's patch includes our newest champion, Neeko, the Curious Chameleon, new skins, and much more! Continue reading for more information!

body:
Zed 
Base HP increased from 584 to 630
AD per level increased from 3.4 to 4
Attack speed per level increased from 2.1 to 3
